name: Sulfadiazine items per 1000 patients
title: Sulfadiazine items per 1000 patients
y_label: Number of sulfadiazine items per 1000 patients
why_it_matters: of selection errors between sulfadiazine and sulfasalazine – two look-alike sound-alike (LASA) drugs.
Sulfadiazine is a specialist antibacterial drug which is not usually prescribed in primary care.
Any prescribing on this measure could prompt investigation to ascertain if sulfadiazine was prescribed in error.
You can read more about the background to this measure in this study.
